data.message: Multiple issues this week.. Videos showing they are uploading from my phone but once they show 100% the screen goes blank, photos are uploading sideways, even using the camera option, and constantly asking to sign in in the middle of posting/commenting.  What is going on?

replies.message: Hi Donna. We're sorry to hear you are experiencing these issues. We want to help solve them as soon as possible. Please feel free to let our team know more about these issues in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2heLc06. -Anna
